hero.subtitle: Italian grocery store and catering service

menu.title: The daily menu
menu.description: Discover our daily menu, prepared with fresh and seasonal ingredients. Our chef offers a variety of dishes that change every day to offer you new flavors. Visit us to taste our specialties and enjoy the authentic Italian cuisine.

about.title: About Squisito
about.description: Squisito is an Italian grocery store and catering service located in the heart of Paris. We offer high-quality products and dishes prepared with passion by our chef. Every day, we offer different recipes, always made with fresh and seasonal ingredients.
about.dailyMenu: Our menu changes daily to offer you new flavors
about.qualityProducts: We carefully select our products to guarantee exceptional quality

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Discover our products and prepared dishes

reviews.title: What our customers say
reviews.viewMore: See more reviews on Google Maps

footer.description: High-quality Italian grocery store and catering service in the heart of Paris.
